wishlist.title: Friday After Next
wishlist.plot: Working as security guards, Craig and Day-Day run into the thief who stole their Christmas presents.

wishlist.title: Kristin's Christmas Past
wishlist.plot: Given the opportunity to visit her estranged family on Christmas Eve 1996, Kristin Cartwright hopes to change her past in order to improve her current life in 2013.

wishlist.title: The Family Man
wishlist.plot: A fast-lane investment broker, offered the opportunity to see how the other half lives, wakes up to find that his sports car and girlfriend have become a mini-van and wife.
